title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, stem, eyelet, and four sided stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Within a curving floral border, four alphabets and a text: "Fragrant the rose but it fades in time/ The violet sweet but quick past the prime/ While lillies hand their heads and soon decay/ And whiter snow in minutes melts away/ Such and so withering are our earthly joys/ Which Time or Sickness speedily destroy" then a scene of a house in a landscape and a signature.
name: Sampler
